For now if there's opportunity knocking on your doors grab it since it will add to your portfolio and can solidify your reputation then be the best choice for them.It's a shame, but that's the problem with the crypto job industry at the moment. They can also be forged, so companies only look for CVs and portfolios for already successful companies, which undermines application value for some.

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: Quote from: dansus021 on June 23, 2023, 02:17:12 AMMaybe we should pin this thread   But most of Cryptocurrency Job is highly skilled worker especially smart contract programmer is on high demand, Is there any sort of tutorial to guide how to become Smart Contract Engineer?There are some things you don't just learn by tutorial guide videos, some things are far more complicated than that and this right here is amongst those things that requires better knowledge and learning process than just a tutorial video. It's a very technical job, and would require more technically savvy knowledge for you to be able to achieve anything great from the job. I also think that there are some online courses you can take to understand it but it's not something you learn quickly especially when you want to be employed for your knowledge on the job.
